Package exception

package exception
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    CardTypeException
    Exception thrown when the card id is wrong
    EveryPlayerDisconnectedException
    Checked exception to signal that every player has disconnected from the game.
    IllegalCardTypeException
    Unchecked Exception thrown when a wrong number is in a file to create cards and tiles
    MatchFullException
    Checked exception thrown when Match is full
    NotAnExchangeEffectException
    The unchecked exception to signal that effect is not an exchange effect of a building card
    NotApplicableException
    This is a checked Exception, the caller of an action must deal with the fact that the action should be not applicable.
    ResourceTypeException
    The unchecked exception thrown when an invalid resource type is passed to the Resource Factory
    WrongClientHandlerException
    The checked exception thrown when the passes Client Handler doesn't have a player associated
    WrongPlayerException
    A checked Exception to signal a wrong player to send a command to has been selected
